entry.title: Probability Distribution
entry.summary: The probability distribution or probability function of a random variable X is a description of the probability associated with the possible values of X. The probability distribution helps us to describe how the probability is distributed along our sample space. It associates for each outcome of our experiment a likelihood. In some cases, it is convenient … Continue reading Probability Distribution

entry.title: Probability: dealing with uncertainties
entry.summary: In this post we are going to talk about some concepts of probability. But first I would like to explain how I ended up here. A few months ago, I had started studying inferential statistics...
